q_en: What are the cutting tasks that will only start after May 1, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.start_time > '2024-05-01';
steps.description: Retrieve cutting tasks that have a start time after May 1, 2024

response:
